title: Accessing data from the IGVF Catalog
text: Impact Genomic Variation Function (IGVF) Consortium, aims understand genomic variation affects genome function, turn impacts phenotype. NHGRI funding collaborative program brings together teams investigators use state---art experimental computational approaches model, predict, characterize map genome function, genome function shapes phenotype, processes affected genomic variation. joint efforts produce catalog impact genomic variants genome function phenotypes. IGVF Catalog described last sentence available number interfaces, including web interface well two programmatic interfaces. addition, Data Portal, raw processed data can downloaded, web interface programmatic interface. package, rigvf, focuses Catalog Data Portal. IGVF Catalog form knowledge graph, nodes biological entities variants, genes, pathways, etc. edges relationships nodes, e.g. empirically measured effects variants cis-regulatory elements (CREs) transcripts proteins. edges may metadata including information cell type context information association measured, e.g. experiment predictive model.

title: Accessing data from the IGVF Catalog
text: proof--concept illustrates access IGVF Catalog. limited functionality implemented.

title: Accessing data from the IGVF Catalog
text: IGVF offers two programmatic interfaces. ‘catalog’ https://api.catalog.igvf.org/# prefered, optimized queries relevant information. Queries simple REST requests implemented using httr2 package. query variants associated “GCK”; one also use, e.g., Ensembl identifiers.
code: rigvf::gene_variants(gene_name = "GCK") #> # A tibble: 25 × 9 #>    `sequence variant`      gene  label log10pvalue effect_size source source_url #>    <chr>                   <chr> <chr>       <dbl>       <dbl> <chr>  <chr>      #>  1 variants/8c6a683829bcb… gene… eQTL         4.89       0.274 GTEx   https://s… #>  2 variants/cf796b5a16212… gene… eQTL         5.76       0.221 GTEx   https://s… #>  3 variants/9a36af4633321… gene… eQTL         6.17      -0.266 GTEx   https://s… #>  4 variants/2fefe07a0750b… gene… eQTL         3.69       0.158 GTEx   https://s… #>  5 variants/ab6df1152a643… gene… eQTL        16.9       -0.353 GTEx   https://s… #>  6 variants/92833b52621e5… gene… eQTL         4.86      -0.170 GTEx   https://s… #>  7 variants/bceca4e6ac3cd… gene… eQTL         4.63      -0.340 GTEx   https://s… #>  8 variants/0a8ba63e5451a… gene… eQTL         4.94       0.215 GTEx   https://s… #>  9 variants/80f639e0da643… gene… eQTL         6.59      -0.330 GTEx   https://s… #> 10 variants/7f4ca6f1cfd70… gene… eQTL         4.10      -0.165 GTEx   https://s… #> # ℹ 15 more rows #> # ℹ 2 more variables: biological_context <chr>, chr <chr>  response <- rigvf::gene_variants(gene_id = "ENSG00000106633", verbose = TRUE) response #> # A tibble: 25 × 9 #>    `sequence variant` gene              label log10pvalue effect_size source #>    <list>             <list>            <chr>       <dbl>       <dbl> <chr>  #>  1 <named list [14]>  <named list [11]> eQTL         4.89       0.274 GTEx   #>  2 <named list [14]>  <named list [11]> eQTL         5.76       0.221 GTEx   #>  3 <named list [14]>  <named list [11]> eQTL         6.17      -0.266 GTEx   #>  4 <named list [14]>  <named list [11]> eQTL         3.69       0.158 GTEx   #>  5 <named list [14]>  <named list [11]> eQTL        16.9       -0.353 GTEx   #>  6 <named list [14]>  <named list [11]> eQTL         4.86      -0.170 GTEx   #>  7 <named list [14]>  <named list [11]> eQTL         4.63      -0.340 GTEx   #>  8 <named list [14]>  <named list [11]> eQTL         4.94       0.215 GTEx   #>  9 <named list [14]>  <named list [11]> eQTL         6.59      -0.330 GTEx   #> 10 <named list [14]>  <named list [11]> eQTL         4.10      -0.165 GTEx   #> # title: Accessing data from the IGVF Catalog
text: ‘ArangoDB’ REST API provides flexibility requires greater understanding Arango Query Language database schema. Documentation available database ‘Support’ menu item ‘REST API’ tab using username ‘guest’ password ‘guestigvfcatalog’. following directly queries database variants Ensembl gene id. AQL help page ?db_queries outlines available user-facing functions. See ?arango developer-oriented information.
code: rigvf::db_gene_variants("ENSG00000106633", threshold = 0.85) #> # A tibble: 40 × 9 #>    `_key`              `_id` `_from` `_to` `_rev` `score:long` source source_url #>    <chr>               <chr> <chr>   <chr> <chr>         <dbl> <chr>  <chr>      #>  1 genic_chr7_4415452… regu… regula… gene… _g5CU…        0.989 ENCOD… https://w… #>  2 promoter_chr7_4415… regu… regula… gene… _g5CU…        0.869 ENCOD… https://w… #>  3 genic_chr7_4414584… regu… regula… gene… _g5CU…        0.948 ENCOD… https://w… #>  4 promoter_chr7_4415… regu… regula… gene… _g5CU…        1.00  ENCOD… https://w… #>  5 promoter_chr7_4415… regu… regula… gene… _g5CU…        1.00  ENCOD… https://w… #>  6 intergenic_chr7_44… regu… regula… gene… _g5CU…        0.959 ENCOD… https://w… #>  7 genic_chr7_4415544… regu… regula… gene… _g5CV…        0.942 ENCOD… https://w… #>  8 promoter_chr7_4415… regu… regula… gene… _g5CV…        0.929 ENCOD… https://w… #>  9 intergenic_chr7_44… regu… regula… gene… _g5CV…        0.936 ENCOD… https://w… #> 10 promoter_chr7_4415… regu… regula… gene… _g5CW…        0.966 ENCOD… https://w… #> # ℹ 30 more rows #> # ℹ 1 more variable: biological_context <chr> aql <- system.file(package = "rigvf", "aql", "gene_variants.aql") readLines(aql) |> noquote() #> [1] FOR l IN regulatory_regions_genes      #> [2]     FILTER l._to == @geneid            #> [3]     FILTER l.`score:long` > @threshold #> [4]     RETURN l sessionInfo() #> R version 4.4.1 (2024-06-14) #> Platform: x86_64-pc-linux-gnu #> Running under: Ubuntu 22.04.5 LTS #>  #> Matrix products: default #> BLAS:   /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openblas-pthread/libblas.so.3  #> LAPACK: /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openblas-pthread/libopenblasp-r0.3.20.so;  LAPACK version 3.10.0 #>  #> locale: #>  [1] LC_CTYPE=C.UTF-8       LC_NUMERIC=C           LC_TIME=C.UTF-8        #>  [4] LC_COLLATE=C.UTF-8     LC_MONETARY=C.UTF-8    LC_MESSAGES=C.UTF-8    #>  [7] LC_PAPER=C.UTF-8       LC_NAME=C              LC_ADDRESS=C           #> [10] LC_TELEPHONE=C         LC_MEASUREMENT=C.UTF-8 LC_IDENTIFICATION=C    #>  #> time zone: UTC #> tzcode source: system (glibc) #>  #> attached base packages: #> [1] stats     graphics  grDevices utils     datasets  methods   base      #>  #> loaded via a namespace (and not attached): #>  [1] jsonlite_1.8.9    dplyr_1.1.4       compiler_4.4.1    tidyselect_1.2.1  #>  [5] rigvf_0.0.0.9003  tidyr_1.3.1       jquerylib_0.1.4   systemfonts_1.1.0 #>  [9] textshaping_0.4.0 yaml_2.3.10       fastmap_1.2.0     R6_2.5.1          #> [13] rjsoncons_1.3.1   generics_0.1.3    curl_5.2.3        httr2_1.0.4       #> [17] knitr_1.48        tibble_3.2.1      desc_1.4.3        bslib_0.8.0       #> [21] pillar_1.9.0      rlang_1.1.4       utf8_1.2.4        cachem_1.1.0      #> [25] xfun_0.47         fs_1.6.4          sass_0.4.9        memoise_2.0.1     #> [29] cli_3.6.3         withr_3.0.1       pkgdown_2.1.1     magrittr_2.0.3    #> [33] digest_0.6.37     rappdirs_0.3.3    lifecycle_1.0.4   vctrs_0.6.5       #> [37] evaluate_1.0.0    glue_1.7.0        whisker_0.4.1     ragg_1.3.3        #> [41] fansi_1.0.6       rmarkdown_2.28    purrr_1.0.2       tools_4.4.1       #> [45] pkgconfig_2.0.3   htmltools_0.5.8.1

what: Interface to the Impact of Genomic Variation on Function (IGVF) Data Portal
title: Interface to the Impact of Genomic Variation on Function (IGVF) Data Portal
text: proof--concept illustrates access Impact Genomic Variation Function (‘IGVF’) Catalog R. limited functionality currently implemented.

title: Interface to the Impact of Genomic Variation on Function (IGVF) Data Portal
text: Install development version GitHub :

title: Interface to the Impact of Genomic Variation on Function (IGVF) Data Portal
text: See Accessing data IGVF Catalog vignette basic use.

what: Internal interface to ArangoDB REST API — arango
title: Internal interface to ArangoDB REST API — arango
text: Objects documented page developer use. arango_request() formulates 'GET' 'POST' ArangoDB API. arango_auth() uses username password authenticate database. arango_collections() implements _api/collection endpoint available collections IGVF database. arango_cursor() implements _api/cursor endpoint allow user-specified query IGVF database.

title: Internal interface to ArangoDB REST API — arango
code: arango_request(path, ..., body = NULL, jwt_token = NULL)  arango_auth(   username = rigvf_config$get("username"),   password = rigvf_config$get("password") )  arango_collections(   username = rigvf_config$get("username"),   password = rigvf_config$get("password") )  arango_cursor(   query,   ...,   username = rigvf_config$get("username"),   password = rigvf_config$get("password") )

title: Internal interface to ArangoDB REST API — arango
text: path character(1) path API end point. Note database-specfic paths prefixed /_db/igvf. ... arango_request(), named arguments used query parameters. arango_cursor(), named arguments interpreted bind variables query. body NULL, formulate POST request JSON body. jwt_token character(1) JWT token obtained via arango_auth(). username character(1) ArangoDB user name. Default: "guest". password character(1) ArangoDB password. Default: "guestigvfcatalog". better practice use environment variable record password, rather encoding script, password = Sys.getenv("RIGVF_ARANGODB_PASSWORD"). query character(1) FILE NAME (without extension .aql query template.

title: Internal interface to ArangoDB REST API — arango
text: arango_request() returns JSON response character(1) vector. arango_auth() returns JWT token used authentication subsequent calls. arango_collections() returns tibble columns name, type (either 'node' 'edge'), count. arango_cursor() returns JSON character(1) 'result' query.

title: Internal interface to ArangoDB REST API — arango
text: arango_auth() 'memoized', invoked per hour particular user password. memoised result can cleared memoise::forget(arango_auth). arango_cursor() expects queries written package system files inst/aql directory. allows rapid iteration query development (package need re-loaded query updated) opportunity language-specific highlighting supported developer's text editor.

title: Internal interface to ArangoDB REST API — arango
Query the 'IGVF' REST API — catalog
text: page documents functions using IGVF 'REST' API, documented https://api.catalog.igvf.org/# gene_variants() locates GTEx eQTLs splice QTLs associate gene using IGVF 'catalog' API. one gene_id, hgnc, gene_name, alias specified.

title: Query the 'IGVF' REST API — catalog
code: gene_variants(   gene_id = NULL,   hgnc = NULL,   gene_name = NULL,   alias = NULL,   organism = "Homo sapiens",   verbose = FALSE )

title: Query the 'IGVF' REST API — catalog
text: gene_id character(1) Ensembl gene identifier, e.g., "ENSG00000106633" hgnc character(1) HGNC identifier. gene_name character(1) Gene symbol, e.g., "GCK" alias character(1) Gene alias organism character(1) Either 'Homo sapiens' (default) 'Mus musculus'. verbose logical(1) return additional information variants genes.

title: Query the 'IGVF' REST API — catalog
text: gene_variants() returns tibble describing variants associated gene; use verbose = TRUE retrieve extensive information.

title: Query the 'IGVF' REST API — catalog

title: Query the 'IGVF' 'ArangoDB' — db_edges
text: edges() nodes() identify edges nodes data base. db_gene_variants() locates variants associated (Ensembl) gene identifier.

title: Query the 'IGVF' 'ArangoDB' — db_edges
code: db_edges(   username = rigvf_config$get("username"),   password = rigvf_config$get("password") )  db_nodes(   username = rigvf_config$get("username"),   password = rigvf_config$get("password") )  db_gene_variants(   gene_id,   threshold,   username = rigvf_config$get("username"),   password = rigvf_config$get("password") )

title: Query the 'IGVF' 'ArangoDB' — db_edges
text: username character(1) ArangoDB user name. Default: "guest". password character(1) ArangoDB password. Default: "guestigvfcatalog". better practice use environment variable record password, rather encoding script, password = Sys.getenv("RIGVF_ARANGODB_PASSWORD"). gene_id character(1) Ensembl gene identifier. threshold numeric(1) minimum score associated variant.

title: Query the 'IGVF' 'ArangoDB' — db_edges
text: edges() nodes() return tibble edge node name count occurrences database. db_gene_variants() returns tibble summarizing variants associated gene.

title: Query the 'IGVF' 'ArangoDB' — db_edges

what: Package configuration global variable management — rigvf
title: Package configuration global variable management — rigvf
text: Objects documented page developer use. rigvf_config provides simple interface manage 'package global' variables via rigvf_config$get(), rigvf_config$set(), etc. default username password provide guest access.

title: Package configuration global variable management — rigvf
Package configuration global variable management — rigvf
text: rigvf_config list functions listing (ls())manipulating (get(), set(), unset()) package-global variables.
